description: This is a Markdown source file for a Slidev presentation, containing YAML frontmatter for slide configuration, markdown content for slides including text, code snippets, diagrams, and embedded components. It serves as the source for a presentation built with Slidev.

classes.name: Counter
classes.description: A Vue component for counter functionality, used within slides.

classes.name: Tweet
classes.description: A component to embed tweets, used within slides.

classes.name: VDrag
classes.description: A component to make elements draggable interactively.

classes.name: VDragArrow
classes.description: A component to display draggable arrows with directional control.

classes.name: PoweredBySlidev
classes.description: A component that displays a 'Powered by Slidev' badge or message.

methods.name: $slidev.nav.openInEditor
methods.description: Open the presentation in an editor mode.
